package.name: deseq2

actions.action: export PATH=$PATH:$R_HOME/bin && export R_LIBS=$INSTALL_DIR/deseq2/ && Rscript -e "source('http://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R'); biocLite('DESeq2')"

package.readme: Differential gene expression analysis based on the negative binomial distribution. http://www.bioconductor.org/packages/2.12/bioc/html/DESeq2.html Ubuntu has a bug with libgfortran. To fix that create a symlink like: sudo ln -s /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgfortran.so.3 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgfortran.so
